text: Ali Muhammad Khan Dehlvi JP (born 1875) was a political leader, lawyer and journalist of British India. He organised several Muslim educational and political conferences at Karachi and Hyderabad, Sindh, and later was a delegate to the famous All India Muslim Leagues Lahore session of 1940. Category:1875 births Category:Politicians from Mumbai Category:Leaders of All India Muslim League
title: Ali Muhammad Khan Dehlvi
